message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about weather forecasting. Option (B) is incorrect since a weatherman wouldn't predict nothing if there is an expected storm. Option (C) is not a realistic expectation as cats cannot fly. Option (D), while unrelated, could be a fun activity to consider during rainy weather, but it is not what the weatherman is warning about.
